summary: Two well-to-do couples with plenty to lose have dinner to discuss the gruesome act their teenage sons may or may not have committed together.
cast: Thekla Reuten|Jonas Smulders|Reinout Bussemaker|Daan Schuurmans|Jacob Derwig|Kim van Kooten|Sabine Soetanto|Lukas Dijkema|Wil van der Meer|Serge Mensink|Raynor van de Water|Hanne Arendzen|Noah de Nooij|Andre Dongelmans|Olaf Malmberg|Camilla Meurer|Gusta Geleynse|Maurits de Kroon|Harpert Michielsen|Dani Stauder|Fairy Morgaine|Dave van den Broek|Francesca Pichel
title: Het diner
